attributes.action: stop the multinational Tesco Stores taking over the high streets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tesco is marching across Wales and moving into small towns, in this case Machynlleth, a small ancient market town in Wales. We have a wealth of small individual shops and 3 small but adequate supermarkets. WE DO NOT NEED A Tesco. IT will kill the town dead as it has done in Portmadoc.Its just NOT the right place. THEY MUST BE STOPPED. Please.
